EXTRACTED VALUE: Kevin Martin (flu) will play on Saturday against the Bulls.
Marquis Daniels (personal) is likely out for Wednesday's game against the Wizards.
Coach Alvin Gentry does not appear concerned about the foot sprain Grant Hill suffered in Wednesday's practice.
Will Bynum (hamstring) will play on Friday against the Bobcats.
Carlos Arroyo is the only point guard in the Heat's rotation, and coach Erik Spoelstra intends to keep it that way.
Marreese Speights had two points and 11 rebounds off the bench in Wednesday's win over the Pacers.
Charlie Villanueva had 15 points, eight rebounds, three 3-pointers, a steal and a block in Friday's win.
Luc Richard Mbah a Moute was held scoreless on 0-for-4 shooting with three rebounds, one assist, and one steal in 24 minutes on Tuesday.
J.R. Smith is officially out of the doghouse in Denver and had 21 points, four rebounds and three 3-pointers on 6-of-10 shooting on Friday.
Luke Ridnour is expected to regain his starting job starting Wednesday night.
Ray Allen had season-high 25 points, three 3-pointers, three rebounds, three assists and two steals in Friday's win.
Amir Johnson quietly had a perfect night with 14 points, nine rebounds, a steal and a block in 31 minutes of Friday's win.
Keith Bogans (back) is a game-time decision for Wednesday's preseason game against the Raptors.
